sk.stuba.fiit.perconik.ivda.activity.deserializer

Class CustomDeserializer<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonDeserializer<T>
      • sk.stuba.fiit.perconik.ivda.activity.deserializer.CustomDeserializer<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PolymorphicDeserializer

    @ThreadSafe
public class CustomDeserializer<T>
extends com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonDeserializer<T>
    Created by Seky on 20. 7. 2014.

    Vlastny deserializer. Ktory priradi objekt z jsonu na zaklade specifickeho kluca.
